entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and local blowing snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming south 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
